text: Carlotta Barilli (2 September 1935 - 15 July 2020) was an Italian actress. She was born in Parma, Italy. Barilli was known for her roles in Ragazzi del Juke- Box (1959), Howlers in the Dock (1960) and La commare secca (1962). She appeared in many movies directed by Bernardo Bertolucci. Barilli died on 15 July 2020 in Rome, aged 84.Addio a Carlotta Barilli, attrice di cinema, radio e tv ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Actors from Parma
title: Carlotta Barilli
